source:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_00<tab>Chaqurl Qhotl would convince you of the merits of his theory regarding the Ronkan protection of the Qitari.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ホパル古盤のチャクルリ・コテルは、ロンカ皇帝による「キタリ族守護説」を唱えているようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_01<tab>Electing to put your faith in Chaqurl Qhotl's argument, you express your support for his theory of Ronkan beneficence, a vote of confidence that pleases the Qitari child greatly. Grudgingly agreeing that his son may have a point, Qitarl Natl agrees to assist in the restoration of the first stela.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには
「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラスでのみ進行できます。

チャクルリ・コテルと話した。彼の説に基づき、石碑の復元が行われるという。再びチャクルリ・コテルと話そう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_02<tab>Under your watchful eye, the Qitari artisans restore the first stela to Chaqurl Qhotl's best interpretation of its former glory. Encouraged and heartened by reclaiming a vital piece of their legacy, the Stewards now pursue their excavation efforts with newfound zeal. Continue to lend them your aid in their efforts should you so desire.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_02<tab>ルリの発掘隊のキタリたちは、「第一の石碑」の復元完了を、とても喜んでいるようだ。これからも、キタリ族の発掘を手伝っていこう！
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_TODO_00<tab>チャクルリ・コテルと話す

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_001<tab>Father may have his reasons for thinking as he does, but I choose to believe in a brighter version of history.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_001<tab>そるかしの考えた、ロンカ皇帝「キタリ族守護説」、
よいと思ってくださるでござうか？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_002<tab>Yes, I am quite certain that the Ronkan emperor was a benevolent man who protected our ancestors from fearsome beasts and bestowed upon them a position of honor in their society. Surely you can agree?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_002<tab>「第一の石碑」は、初代皇帝とキタリの出会いの場面でござう。
皇帝は、弱～いキタリを魔物から剣で守ってくれて、
キタリ族と皇帝は、信頼しあったトモダチになったでござうよ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>If you elect to vouch for Chaqurl Qhotl's theory, the first stela will be restored to reflect his interpretation of history. Proceed, and you will be unable to view the stela as Qitarl Natl envisions it.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>「チャクルリ・コテル」の説を信じてストーリーを進行させると、
彼の説に基づき、石碑の復元が行われるようです。
「キタルリ・ナトル」の説での復元結果を見ることはできません。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>The rewards you receive and the content of the quests to follow will be the same regardless of the choice you make. You are free to choose the version of history you find most compelling.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>なお、どちらを進行しても、得られるアイテムや、
今後のコンテンツ内容などに、変化はありません。
あなたが語られるべきと思う歴史を、選択してください。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_Q1_000_000<tab>Lend your support to Chaqurl Qhotl's theory of Ronkan history?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_Q1_000_000<tab>「チャクルリ・コテル」の説を支持して、
ストーリーを進行させますか？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_005<tab>Oh, thank you! I am most glad to know that you are a cup-half-full type like myself!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_005<tab>わぁい！！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どののオスミツキがあれば、
間違いないでござうー！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_QITARLNATL_000_006<tab>I cannot help but feel my boy is too optimistic for his own good, and yet... If you would choose to believe his theory, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, there is no reason why I cannot do the same.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_QITARLNATL_000_006<tab>チャクルリの説をお認めいただき……親として嬉しいものにござる。
それがしは、石碑の復元を手伝いにまいろう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_007<tab>At long last, I can look upon the history of my people in all its glory! But our work is far from over. Pray continue to lend us your aid!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_007<tab>ご先祖さまの石碑、ようやく会えるでござうな！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どのも、見届けてほしいでござうよ。
ご準備がよければ、またそるかしに声をかけてくだされ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_008<tab>Father and I will send for our finest artisans. The work must begin at once!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_008<tab>それじゃあ、さっそく発掘隊の職人さんたちに、
石碑をこさえてもらうでござう！
